item.trans: adj. 黄色的；黄皮肤的 n. 黄色；黄种人；黄色颜料 vt. 使变黄或发黄 vi. 变黄或发黄 同义词:maize, xanthic, sunking, giallo Bleach keeps the white clothes from yellowing.漂白剂防止白衣服变黄。
n. 邮资，邮费 同义词:taxe, franking Two yuan plus regular postage .普通邮资再加两元。
n. 抱怨；诉苦；疾病；委屈 同义词:sickness, complain of The most common complaint centres on foreign policy .最常见的抱怨集中在其外交政策上。
n. 英镑；重击，重击声；兽栏；拘留所 vt. 捣烂；敲打；监禁，拘留 vi. 连续重击，猛击 同义词:prison, devel, hold, prison, drive, belt The farmers pound rice in a mortar.农民们在臼中舂米。
adj. 舒适的，舒服的 n. 盖被 同义词:pleasant, easy, cozy Very comfortable and quiet .很舒服，也很安静。
n. 珠，滴；露水；清新 vt. （露水等）弄湿 vi. 结露水 同义词:drop, gutta, get wet, moisten If there's any rising mist or dew in your photo , chances are it's sunrise .如果在你的照片中有任何上升的雾气或露水，十有八九就是日出。
vi. 开始；继续进行；发生；行进 同义词:occur, happen, travel, pursue Work is proceeding slowly.工作正在慢慢地继续进行着。
n. 添加；[数] 加法；增加物 同义词:add, accretion addition , fund managers can lack bargaining power .此外，基金管理者缺乏议价能力。
n. 领域，范围；王国 同义词:domain, territory, kingdom, province, world, universe, extent Loop gravity extends this insight into the quantum realm .环圈重力将这个见解援引至量子领域。
vt. 拒绝；排斥；抵制；丢弃 n. 被弃之物或人；次品 同义词:refuse, negative, inferior, degraded product I rejected his suggestion.我不同意他的建议。
n. 力量；武力；军队；魄力 vt. 促使，推动；强迫；强加 同义词:strength, might, army, sword, muscle, bring, drive I forced him to do it.我强迫他做这件事。
vi. 高兴；庆祝 vt. 使高兴 同义词:pleasure, be pleased, glad, pleasure, satisfy He often rejoices at other people's misfortunes.他常常对别人幸灾乐祸。
n. 干草 vt. 把晒干 vi. 割草晒干 同义词:hey, stover Farmers ( and cotton bulls ) should hay – or cotton – while the sun shines.棉农（以及棉花多头人士）应把握机遇赶紧赚钱。
n. 输出，输出量；产量；出产 vt. 输出 同义词:export, crop, harvest, yield, export, bulk out Output is falling in Britain , France , Germany and Japan .英国、法国、德国和日本的生产在下降。
adj. 意识到的；故意的；神志清醒的 同义词:aware, intended, studied, designed They are conscious acceptors of culture from other country and active spreaders of it as well.外语教师既是异域文化自觉的接受者，又是异域文化主动的传播者。
vi. 倾斜；投掷；搭帐篷；坠落 vt. 投；掷；定位于；用沥青涂；扎营；向前倾跌 n. 沥青；音高；程度；树脂；倾斜；投掷 同义词:slope, throw, lean, throw, cast, camp, extent, degree, resin, putting, measure pitched paper柏油纸
adj. 能干的，能胜任的；有才华的 同义词:able, competent These instruments capable of very high precision .这些仪器可以达到很高的精密度。
vt. 容纳；使适应；供应；调解 vi. 适应；调解 同义词:adapt, contain, suit, accept, serve, adjust, adapt to something to accommodate oneself to circumstances使自己适应情况(或环境)
n. 笑；笑声 同义词:risus The first wealth is health . Laughter , the best medicine .健康是首要的财富。而大笑是最好的药品。
n. 关系；关联 同义词:connection, correlation, bearing, concern, link She found it impossible to extricate herself from the relationship .她发现不可能把自己从这种关系中解脱出来。
n. 婴儿；幼儿；未成年人 adj. 婴儿的；幼稚的；初期的；未成年的 同义词:baby, minor, earlier, young, baby, minor, tender Objective To study the clinical value of parotid gland hemangioma operation in infant .目的了解手术治疗婴幼儿腮腺血管瘤的临床价值。
n. 车库；汽车修理厂；飞机库 vt. 把……送入车库 同义词:carbarn, carport Can we use the garage ?我们可以使用车库吗？
vt. 扩张；使膨胀；详述 vi. 发展；张开，展开 同义词:dwell on, enlarge on, grow, go way They hope to expand their company.他们希望扩大公司的规模。
adj. 精神的；脑力的；疯的 n. 精神病患者 同义词:spiritual, inner, psychopath, madman Many mental patients can not memorize much .很多精神病人不能记住很多。
prep. 关于，至于 同义词:concerning, about, in the case of, with reference to, in relation to I had nothing to say regarding this matter.对于这件事我无话可说。
n. 联盟，协会；工会；联合 同义词:alliance, league, unity, combination, combined with In Union , he learned to talk politics .在工会组织里，他学会了谈论政治。
n. 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物 vi. 像火炬一样燃烧 vt. 用火炬点燃 同义词:firebrand, flashlight He was charged with torching a storehouse.他被指控纵火烧仓库。

n. 意图；目的；意向；愈合 同义词:goals, purpose, sake, meaning, will He may have no intention of disarming himself, only of provoking division among the other five across the table .他并没有接触核武装的意图，仅仅是采用分化谈判桌上的其他五个国家的策略。
vt. 传达；运输；让与 同义词:communicate, release, transport This train conveys over one thousand passengers every day.这列火车每天运送一千多位旅客。
n. 实验室，研究室 同义词:lab That water tower stands behind our laboratory .那个水塔位于我们实验室后面。
n. 结果；重要性；推论 同义词:outcome, product, result, significance, event, conclusion Its chief consequence is that they cannot do their job well.其主要后果是，它们不能做好自己的本职工作。
vt. 翻阅；以拇指拨弄；作搭车手势；笨拙地摆弄 vi. 用拇指翻书页；竖起拇指要求搭车 n. 拇指 同义词:turn over, browse through The pages were badly thumbed.书页给翻得脏极了。
vt. 净化；使纯净 vi. 净化；变纯净 同义词:cleanse, decontaminate, fine purification, purge This salt has been purified for use in medicine.供药用的盐已被净化。
adj. 经济的，经济上的；经济学的 How could genuine economic freedom and equality of opportunity exist in such circumstances ?在这种环境下，怎么能有真正的经济自由和机会均等呢？

adj. 从前的，前者的；前任的 n. 模型，样板；起形成作用的人 同义词:long-ago, old-time, matrix, model, shape, template The problem is that the most practical option for such a corridor would be in former Peruvian territory .现在问题是，这个最切合实际的运输通道将会经过秘鲁的一个原属地区。
adv. 最后，终于 同义词:finally, ultimately, lastly To lighten their reading material , people eventually began to write on silk .为了减轻读本的重量，人们最终开始在丝绸上书写。
n. 一口，满口 同义词:morsel, gobbet He drank another mouthful of gin .他又喝了一口杜松子酒。
n. 壶；盆；罐 vt. 把…装罐；射击；节略 vi. 随手射击 同义词:basin, kettle, flight, take a shot at potted meat罐头肉
n. 繁荣，成功 同义词:success, victory, winning, up, hit The only road to enduring prosperity and stability is through open markets and open trade .通往持久繁荣和稳定的唯一之路是畅开市场和贸易之门”。
n. 阳光；愉快；晴天；快活 同义词:brightness, Suny Kindness is sunshine of social life .善良即是投进社会生活的阳光。
n. 缺点，缺陷；不足之处 vi. 变节；叛变 同义词:deficiency, disadvantage, vice, fault, shortcoming, apostatize, rise up The scientist defected to another country.那名科学家叛逃到另一国家了。
n. 细胞；电池；蜂房的巢室；单人小室 vi. 住在牢房或小室中 同义词:electric battery, electric element He celled with two other prisoners.他与另外两犯人一同关在一间牢房中。
n. 厚度；层；浓度；含混不清 同义词:concentration, layer, stratum Can all these apparent indications of plate thickness really be mistaken ?所有这些关于板块厚度的明显标志有可能弄错吗？
adj. 相似的 n. 类似物 同义词:alike, like, analog Similar situations occur all the time.类似的情况一直在发生。

adj. 先进的；高级的；晚期的；年老的 v. 前进；增加；上涨（advance的过去式和过去分词形式） 同义词:senior, aged, high, old, ancient, rose, improved Now , here is more information about our story last week on a study by scientists at Advanced Cell Technology .现在，有更多的信息关于我们提到的上个星期高级细胞技术的科学家的一项研究。

adv. 第一；首先；优先；宁愿 n. 第一；开始；冠军 adj. 第一的；基本的；最早的 num. 第一 同义词:primarily, soon, initially, rather, threshold, conception, beginning, opening, title, elementary, premier, fundamental, basic, essential Let your boss make first move .让你的上司来做第一步行动。
n. 自然；性质；本性；种类 同义词:property, category, variety, manner, kind It uses animals to explore human nature .它们用动物来探究人类的本性。
n. 希腊语；希腊人 adj. 希腊的；希腊人的，希腊语的 同义词:Hellene, Achaean, hellenic, Grecian Meanwhile , policymakers are watching with concern the unfolding of the Greek debt crisis .与此同时，政策制定者正在关注希腊债务危机的演变。
n. 拥有；财产；领地；自制；着迷 同义词:estate, property, treasure, worth The sense of triumph and renewed possession swelled within him .胜利和重新占有的感觉又在他心里涌起了。
vt. 修理，修补；改善；修改 vi. 改善，好转 n. 好转，改进；修补处 同义词:improve, repair, doctor, modify, change for the better, polish up, reforming, improvement in Can you mend this broken chair?你能修理这把破椅子吗?
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
vt. 浸，泡，蘸；舀取；把伸入 vi. 浸；下降，下沉；倾斜；舀，掏 n. 下沉，下降；倾斜；浸渍，蘸湿 同义词:steep, dunk, decline, pitch, slope, swim, reduction, decline, slope, fall, subsidence He dipped the brush into the paint bucket.他拿画笔蘸颜料桶中的颜料。
n. [化学] 分子；微小颗粒，微粒 同义词:numerator of a fraction, microne How does he explain their almost magical convergence in a single elongated molecule of carbon ?他该如何解释这些功能神奇地集中在一条拉长的碳分子管中？
adj. 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的 adv. 便宜地 同义词:inexpensive, ten-cent I was very lucky to get it so cheap .我这么便宜地买到它，真是幸运极了。
n. 蚊子 同义词:skeeter Malaria is caused by a parasite which is passed to humans though mosquito bites .疟疾是通过蚊虫叮咬后传入人体内的寄生虫引发的一种疾病。
vt. 鼓励，怂恿；激励；支持 同义词:heart, stimulate, power, hand, second Her coach encouraged her throughout the marathon race to keep on running.她的教练在马拉松赛全程鼓励她继续不断奔跑。
adj. 可憎的；可恨的；可恶的 同义词:detestable, blanky Ironing shirts is a hateful job .烫衬衣是件讨厌的事。
n. 视力；景象；眼界；见解 vt. 看见；瞄准 vi. 瞄准；观看 adj. 见票即付的；即席的 同义词:vision, scene, eye, scope, seeing, see, clap eyes on, level, watch, off-the-cuff, improvisatorial to sight something看到某物
adj. 特级的；极好的 n. 特级品，特大号；临时雇员 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, great, class, temporary, speciality product Welcome to Super Stereos . What can I do for you ?欢迎光临超级立体音响。我能为您效劳吗？
n. 糖；食糖；甜言蜜语 vt. 加糖于；粉饰 vi. 形成糖 同义词:saccharide, sweet talk, colour, prettify Don't sugar your coffee,dear.亲爱的，别往你的咖啡中放糖。
n. 基督徒，信徒 adj. 基督教的；信基督教的 All of the schools are Christian .所有的学院学生都是基督徒。
adj. 法国的；法语的；法国人的 n. 法国人；法语 同义词:Gallo, Francais Really ? So interesting ! I know the most famous kiss is French kiss , right ?真的吗？这么有趣！我还知道最著名的吻是法式热吻，对吗？
adj. 共和国的；共和政体的；共和主义的；拥护共和政体的 n. 共和主义者 In the 2002 mid-term elections the Republican Party increased its majority in the House and captured the Senate .在2002年的期中选举中，共和党占据了众议院绝大部分的席位，并控制了参议院。
vt. 打气；用抽水机抽… n. 泵，抽水机；打气筒 vi. 抽水 同义词:pull for, inflator The heart pumps blood round the body.心脏将血液压送到全身。
vi. 合作，配合；协力 同义词:fit, work together Let's all cooperate to get the work done quickly.让我们通力合作使这项工作迅速完成。
n. 学科；纪律；训练；惩罚 vt. 训练，训导；惩戒 同义词:science, punishment, rod, knowledge, payment, coach, drill The football team was disciplined by a professional trainer.这支足球队受过专业教练员的训练。
vi. 滴下；充满；漏下 n. 水滴，滴水声；静脉滴注；使人厌烦的人 vt. 使滴下；溢出，发出 同义词:abound with, be imbued with, waterdrop, flood, emit The rain was dripping off the roof.雨水从屋檐往下滴。
n. 方法；条理；类函数 adj. 使用体验派表演方法的 同义词:approach, way, system, medium, how It was a feudal method .这是一种封建的方法。
vt. 激发；鼓舞；启示；产生；使生灵感 同义词:stimulate, lift, wake, spirit, effect His speech inspired the soldiers.他的演说使士兵们大受鼓舞。
adj. 严重的，[医] 急性的；敏锐的；激烈的；尖声的 同义词:serious, bad, keen In short the joy was ephemeral and the hangover acute .简言之，欢乐是短暂的，纵情后的头痛是严重的。
n. 经营者；操作员；话务员；行家 同义词:expert, proprietor Hello . This is operator .喂，这里是接线员。
adj. 可接受的；合意的；可忍受的 同义词:receivable, admissible The disciple was a Jew . " What good work shall I do to be acceptable to God "?一个犹太人门徒问：“我应该做什么样工作才能让上帝接受?”（合上帝之意?。
n. 棉花；棉布；棉线 vi. 一致；理解；和谐；亲近 adj. 棉的；棉制的 同义词:algodon, Baumwolle, square, identify, coincide He could not cotton with the manager.他和经理相处不好。
vi. 编织；结合；皱眉 vt. 编织；结合 n. 编织衣物；编织法 同义词:couple, bond, become one, combine, become one, couple, link She's knitting herself a sweater.她正在给自己织毛线衫。
n. 小屋；村舍；（农舍式的）小别墅 同义词:shed, cabin Why heterosexual men go cottaging or cruising baffles most people.大多数人对异性恋者像同性恋者一样在公共厕所聚集或四出猎艳感到迷惑不解。
n. 革命；旋转；运行；循环 同义词:circulation, rotation, rolling, turning, cycle It is a complete revolution .这完全是一次革命。
adj. 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的 n. 工业股票；工业工人 Demand for industrial salt is steady and predictable .工业盐需求是稳定且可预测的。
vt. 涂黄油于；讨好 n. 黄油；奶油；奉承话 同义词:kiss up to, soft-sawder, cream, beurre He buttered a piece of bread for himself.他为自己把一片面包涂上黄油。
n. 命令；顺序；规则；[贸易] 定单 vt. 命令；整理；定购 vi. 命令；定货 同义词:instruction, bidding, telling, regulation, word, require, command, arrange, command I have ordered for you.我已为你点好菜了。
n. 考虑；原因；关心；报酬 同义词:attention, compensation, payment, cause, matter After due consideration , he decided to accept the position .经过适当考虑后，他决定接受这位置。
n. 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处 vt. 遮蔽；使朦胧；尾随；预示 vi. 渐变；变阴暗 adj. 影子内阁的 同义词:umbrella, shelter, indicate, forecast, dog, shield, curtain, graduate the lane shadowed by a tall tree被大树阴遮蔽的小径
adj. 不同的；个别的，与众不同的 同义词:diverse, unlike, unusual, individual, varying Different nations have different levels of technology .不同的国家的科技水平不同。
n. [化学] 镭（88号元素符号Ra） Madame Curie will always be remembered as the discoverer of the element radium .居里夫人这位镭元素的发现者，将永远为人们所怀念。
n. 市场；行情；股票市场；市面；集市；销路；商店 vt. 在市场上出售 vi. 做买卖 同义词:exchanges, store, shop, outlet, plaza to market one's houses at cheaper prices以较低的价格销售房子

n. 符合；一致；协议；自愿 vt. 使一致；给予 vi. 符合；一致 同义词:agreement, unity, identity, keeping, consensus, afford, allow, deal, extend, deliver, cotton, identify, square, meet with, correspond with to accord disputes调解争端
n. 倾泻；流出；骤雨 vt. 灌，注；倒；倾泻；倾吐 vi. 倾泻；涌流；斟茶 同义词:issue, flux, dumping, shed, flow Mother poured sugar out of a bag into a pot.母亲把糖从袋中倒入罐内。
vt. 给...加薪；给...薪水 n. 薪水 同义词:emolument, paycheck He's salaried every week.他每星期领一次薪水。
n. 堆；许多；累积 vt. 堆；堆积 vi. 堆起来 同义词:lots of, pile, accumulation, sea, hundred, bank up, stack up He heaped the diamonds up and said they were all his.他把那些钻石堆成一堆，然后说那些钻石全是他的。
vt. 感染，传染 同义词:affect, contract, catch, disease, communicate She was infected with tuberculosis.她被传染上了肺结核。
adj. 泥泞的；模糊的；混乱的 vt. 使污浊；使沾上泥；把…弄糊涂 vi. 变得泥泞；沾满烂泥 同义词:fuzzy, dark, chaotic, troubled, vague, bedrabble Don't muddy your new shoes.别弄脏了你的新鞋。
n. 青蛙；[铁路] 辙叉；饰扣 vi. 捕蛙 The researchers had no idea how long their frog cells would last and so decided to freeze them at once .研究人员不知道他们的青蛙细胞能存活多长时间，所以他们决定马上冷冻他们。
vi. 搜索；用耙子耙；掠过，擦过 vt. 倾斜；搜索；掠过；用耙子耙 n. 耙子；斜度；钱耙；放荡的人，浪子 同义词:seek, beat for, seek, slope, pendence, obliqueness He raked the dead leaves together every morning.他每天清晨用耙子将枯叶耙到一起。
n. 脖子；衣领；海峡 vi. 搂著脖子亲吻；变狭窄 vt. 使变细；与…搂著脖子亲吻 同义词:narrow, channel, sound, collar The road suddenly necks down the bridge.下了桥之后，道路突然变得狭窄了。
n. 惩罚；严厉对待，虐待 同义词:rod, payment, discipline, abuse If you do wrong , you deserve severe punishment .如果你做错事，应受严厉的处罚。

adj. 不适合的；不适宜的；不相称的 同义词:inappropriate, inadaptable She has to let go of the unsuitable approach .他得放弃这种不适宜的方法。
n. 偷看；隐约看见，瞥见 vi. 窥视；慢慢露出，出现；吱吱叫 vt. 使出现 同义词:peek, occur, figure, offer The birds peeped exactly as we refilled the feeder.当我们再加饲料的时候，小鸟就唧唧喳喳叫个不停。
n. 颗粒；[物] 质点；极小量；小品词 同义词:grain, granule Coconut powder , Milk , Coconut plant particle , Cane sugar , Sea salt , Soya bean .椰子粉，牛奶，椰子植物颗粒，甘蔗糖，海盐，大豆油。
n. 钱包，小钱袋；金钱，财源 vt. 皱起，缩拢 同义词:bag, wallet, rivel She pursed her lips with disgust.她厌恶地噘起了嘴。
adj. 腐烂的；堕落的；恶臭的；虚弱的；极坏的 adv. 非常 同义词:weak, fallen, rank, extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too But he has done a rotten job of selling it to everybody else .但是在把这一法案“推销”给其他人时，他却做得十分糟糕。
adj. 有耐性的，能容忍的 n. 病人；患者 同义词:indefatigable, sick, sufferer The effect of the treatment upon the patient was magical .这种治疗对于病人的效果是意想不到的。
adj. 男子气概的；强壮的；适于男人的 adv. 雄赳赳地 同义词:strong, tough I am a manly man, with smart head and perfect body , as you see , perfect as the landscape !毕加索一般健壮的男子气概，聪敏的头脑，完美的身体，完美得象那风景，如你所见。
vt. 浪费；使沉溺于；使迷路；遗失；错过 vi. 失败；受损失 同义词:spend, waste on, founder, come to naught Many people lost their jobs because of the economic depression.由于经济萧条，许多人失业了。
n. 结婚；婚姻生活；密切结合，合并 同义词:wedding, merger, consolidation, coalition Love does wonders , but money makes marriage .爱情创造奇迹，金钱构筑婚姻。

n. 管理；规则；校准 adj. 规定的；平常的 同义词:governance, administration, management, supervision, control, specified, stated, usual, prescribed, ordinary As in mature markets , regulation plays a big role .与成熟市场一样，制度发挥着重大作用。
n. 干扰，冲突；干涉 同义词:conflict, disturbance, war, obstacle, collision In fact , depending on the geometry , wave interference can cause the signal to vanish altogether .事实上，在某些几何状况产生的波动干涉，也可能造成信号完全消失。
adj. 庄严的，严肃的；隆重的，郑重的 同义词:serious, sacred, majestic, grave Most representations of George Washington make him look very solemn .乔治。华盛顿在大多数画像中显得很严肃。
n. [植] 胚芽，萌芽；细菌 vi. 萌芽 同义词:seed, plantule, burgeon, spring up Being in a " germ factory " is not necessarily all bad .在一个“细菌工厂”并不完全是不好的。
vt. 使文明；教化；使开化 vi. 变得文明 同义词:to teach Schools will help to civilize the wild tribes there.学校教育将有助于使那里的野蛮部落逐步开化。
adj. 危险的 同义词:critical, risky, threatening, precarious, perilous Unlike asthma it is not dangerous , so people rarely worry about it.不同的是哮喘没有什么威胁，所以人们很少担心。
adv. 机械地；呆板地；物理上地 同义词:automatically, woodenly Even cars that were mechanically sound started rusting .甚至机械性能方面并无问题的车子也开始生锈。
n. 责备；耻辱 vt. 责备；申斥 同义词:blame, thumbs-down, blame for, talk to The manager reproached the new salesgirl for her carelessness.经理斥责新来的女售货员工作上粗心大意。
vi. 上煤；加煤 vt. 给…加煤；把…烧成炭 n. 煤；煤块；木炭 同义词:char, charcoal, xylanthrax Coaling a ship is a dirty job.给轮船装煤是很脏的活。
n. 运动；练习；运用；操练；礼拜；典礼 vt. 锻炼；练习；使用；使忙碌；使惊恐 vi. 运动；练习 同义词:movement, sport, ceremony, campaign, practice, make use of, fashion, occupy, alarm, employ, motion, do sport to exercise the body锻炼身体
n. 变化；[生物] 变异，变种 同义词:shift, change, differentiation, diversification, turn This normal variation in rhythm is known as sinus arrhythmia .节律的这种正常变化称为窦性心律失常。
n. 有机体；生物体；微生物 同义词:living being, biosome My boss is a single-celled organism .我的老板是一位单细胞生物。
n. 甲板；行李仓；露天平台 vt. 装饰；装甲板；打扮 同义词:board, storage room, paint, hang, dress oneself, array They were all decked out in their Sunday best.他们着意打扮，穿上了节日盛装。
adv. 特别；尤其；格外 同义词:peculiarly, notably Also , the training is easy to forget , especially in a crisis .而且，这个训练很容易忘记，特别是在紧要关头。
n. 困苦；苦难；艰难险阻 同义词:affliction, bitterness Previous episodes have not always coincided with hardship at home or testing foreign wars .先前的事件并不总是和国内的困境或国外战争的考验相一致。
adj. 遍及全世界的 Disease epidemics are now world - wide events because of travel between countries .疾病的流行由于人们在各国间的往返而变成一个世界范围内的事件。
vt. 取来；接来；到达；吸引 vi. 拿；取物；卖得 n. 取得；诡计 同义词:absorb, attract, engage, draw, strike, take, taking, procurement, scheme, fraud to fetch a pail of water打回一桶水
adj. 陈腐的；不新鲜的 vi. 变陈旧；撒尿；变得不新鲜 vt. 使变旧；变得不新鲜 n. 尿 同义词:banal, trite, urinate, urine, emiction Fresh thinking , instead of stale arguments , has rarely been so badly needed .新鲜的思维，而不是陈腐的争吵，似乎从未变得如此亟需。
n. 观光；游览 adj. 观光的；游览的 v. 观光（sightsee的ing形式）；游览 同义词:tourism, pleasure trip, visiting, touring What 's a good place sightseeing ?有什么好地方值得观光的吗？
n. [数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt. 标出尺寸 adj. 规格的 同义词:measurement, size Dimension the shelves so that they fit securely into the cabinet.把搁板刨成需要的尺寸以便它们可牢固地镶入贮藏橱中。
adj. 所谓的；号称的 同义词:alleged " In the best cesium fountains the largest source of error are so-called cold collisions , " Gibble explained .吉布解释：「在最好的铯原子喷泉钟内，最大的误差来源是所谓的冷碰撞。」
vi. 滑行；沿岸航行 vt. 沿…岸航行 n. 海岸；滑坡 同义词:taxi, rivage, seacoast The sledge coasted down the mountain slope.雪橇滑下山坡。
adj. 非凡的；特别的；离奇的；临时的；特派的 同义词:remarkable, particular, temporary, special, wonder Our economy is emerging from extraordinary recession into recovery .我们的经济正摆脱衰退到惊人的复苏。

adj. 集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的 n. 集团；集合体；集合名词 同义词:mutual, corporate, common, joint, bloc, clan Still collective effort of the states is already beginning to compensate for the lack of reductions by the Bush administration .不过，美国各州的努力全部加起来，已经使得布希政府没有降低排放量的情形有所补偿。
vi. 流动，涌流；川流不息；飘扬 vt. 淹没，溢过 n. 流动；流量；涨潮，泛滥 同义词:stream, dance, flood, drown out, stream, flux, fresh, flood, quantity of This river flows into the sea.这条河流入大海。

adv. 部分地；偏袒地 同义词:half This is likely to be only partially offset by a pickup in businesses tied more closely to economic growth , such as advising on mergers and acquisitions .同经济增长更加休戚相关的业务好转可能只是在一定程度上予以抵消，比如合并和收购咨询业务。
n. 危难，不幸；贫困；悲痛 vt. 使悲痛；使贫困 同义词:poverty, disaster, evil, want, grief, aggrieve The news of my mother's death distressed me greatly.母亲逝世的噩耗令我极为悲痛。
vt. 舔；卷过；鞭打 vt. （非正式）战胜 vi. 舔；轻轻拍打 n. 舔；打；少许 同义词:tongue, hide, hit, little, touch, beating Allan licked the postage stamp and stuck it on the envelope.阿伦舔了舔邮票，把它贴在信封上。
vt. 发出，表达；发射 adj. 完全的；彻底的；无条件的 同义词:release, put, voice, project, let go, thorough, full, complete, absolute, total He could not utter a word.他什么话也讲不出来。
n. 挂钩，吊钩 vt. 钩住；引上钩 vi. 钩住；弯成钩状 同义词:towing eye, drawhook, hitch I hooked his foot when he passed me and he staggered but didn't fall.他从我身边走过时我勾住了他的脚，他被绊了一个趔趄可并没摔倒。
vt. 控制；使掌握；持有；迷住 同义词:contain, regulate, bit, bottle, manage He decided to give away everything he possessed and become a monk.他决定放弃他所有的一切，出家为僧。
n. 影响；效果；作用 vt. 产生；达到目的 同义词:impression, influence, infection, affection, impact, form, inspire to effect a compromise达成妥协
n. 财富；大量；富有 同义词:treasure, lots of, ocean, money, fortune, sea Everyone is talking about sovereign wealth funds .人人都在谈论主权财富基金。
n. 肢，臂；分支；枝干 vt. 切断…的手足；从…上截下树枝 同义词:extremitas, offshoot The tree was felled and limbed.树被伐倒并被砍去枝条。
n. 电话；耳机，听筒 vt. 打电话 vi. 打电话 同义词:telephone, call, call up sb, ring up, telephone, call up sb If I don't phone the office,she would close up at 5 p.m.要不是我给办事处打了电话，她会在下午5点钟关门的。
vt. 沾污；败坏；给…着色 vi. 污染；被沾污；被染污 n. 污点；瑕疵；着色剂 同义词:poison, pollute, tainture, jaup to stain the table sheet弄脏桌布
